Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Best Western Premier Queen Hotel places you in the heart of Chester, convenient to Northgate Arena Leisure Centre and Chester Zoo. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of St Paul's Church and Grosvenor Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 128 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite body treatments and facials. Additional features at this Victorian hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-out. This hotel has 9 meeting rooms available for events. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Best Western Premier Queen Hotel places you in the heart of Chester, convenient to Northgate Arena Leisure Centre and Chester Zoo. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of St Paul's Church and Grosvenor Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Northgate Arena Leisure Centre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
St Paul's Church - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Grosvenor Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Eastgate Clock - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Chester Cathedral - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Roman Amphitheatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Chester Town Hall - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Chester City Walls - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Newgate - 1 km / 0.6 mi
St Peter's Church - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Dewa Roman Experience - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Grosvenor Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
University of Chester - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Old Dee Bridge - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Chester Castle - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Premier Queen Hotel is Chester (CEG-Hawarden) - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
